Solutions.info: Update patcher to to 1.6+, or, remove all mods that use Essential (ModCore 2)
One or more of your mods has not been reobfuscated properly. Ask the developer of the mod to fix this issue.
Change your connected textures to fast. (Options > Video Settings > Quality > Connected Textures)
Don't hold F3+C
XanderLib encountered an issue whilst installing. Try to update mods that use it. (e.g. EvergreenHUD)
DungeonsGuide failed to authenticate. Make sure it is up to date.

and.value: [kr.syeyoung.dungeonsguide.Authenticator:authenticateAndDownload:111]: java.io.IOException: Server returned HTTP response code: 403 for URL:

Solutions.info: Danker's Skyblock Mod experienced an issue. Make sure it is up to date.
Your GPU appears to be too old for some rendering options in Minecraft. There is no way to fix this other than upgrading your PC.
Essential issue. Get support on Sk1er's support server https://discord.gg/WqkdC8XbVe
Failed to connect to Skyclient Cosmetics API
Dont use "Debug Display Tags" in Skyclient Cosmetics settings (This is Debug feature for a reason)
Likely an issue with SkyblockCatia. This mod has been known to be incompatible with some mods and it is recommended you remove it.
Delete the 'modcore' folder in your .minecraft folder.
SkyblockAddons is encountering problems. Get support [here](https://discord.gg/PqTAEek) and remove it in the meantime.
Sk1er API appears to be down. Please wait until the issue is resolved.

and.value: Server returned HTTP response code: 521 for URL: https://api.sk1er.club

Solutions.info: You either have multiple optifine jars in your mods folder or it is corrupted.

You are using an old Forge version. Mods may depend on this to function properly. Please update it [here](https://maven.minecraftforge.net/net/minecraftforge/forge/1.8.9-11.15.1.2318-1.8.9/forge-1.8.9-11.15.1.2318-1.8.9-installer.jar)
Java has appeared to crash. You can most likely ignore this crash if it doesn't happen again.

and.value: # A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment:

Solutions.info: Cowlections is causing the issue. Remove the mod for now and get support [here](https://discord.gg/KRq5ZY9Hma/)
EvergreenHUD appears to be outdated. [Update here](https://github.com/isXander/EvergreenHUD/releases)
One of your mods tried to render something incorrectly. Make sure it is up to date.

and.value: java.lang.RuntimeException: No OpenGL context found in the current thread.

Recommendations.info: You are using SkyblockExtras. It is highly recommended that you remove it due to incompatibilities with other mods. As well as this, it breaks the [Minecraft EULA](https://account.mojang.com/documents/minecraft_eula) AND the developer is know to have done some pretty bad things. Find alternatives [here](https://proudmuslim.tech/bad-mod-alternatives/sbe.html).
You are using BetterFps. It has been known to get you banned and to cause visual glitches. Consider [Sk1er's Patcher](https://sk1er.club/mods/patcher) if you don't have it already.
You are using the OpenJ9 JVM. This has been known to cause issues even though it uses less memory. To use the alternative, Hotspot, you will have to [re-install Java](https://adoptopenjdk.net/).

and.value: Java VM Version: Eclipse OpenJ9 VM

Recommendations.info: You are using a custom version of Forge. Forks such as Asbyth Forge have been known to cause issues with mods and is not recommended, even by the developer.
Windows 7 is no longer supported by Microsoft. Please upgrade to Windows 10/Linux.
